description: Phase retrieves checked‐in equipment for a configured Bill of Equipment item, displays configuration and current values, allows operator selection of equipment, overwrite and Next Like flags, and gathers cleaning and flushing requirements.
intent: To verify and collect cleaning and flushing parameters for selected equipment by retrieving configuration values and operator inputs, and to generate recipe variables for subsequent phase logic.

inputs.BOEItem: Configured Bill of Equipment item identifier
inputs.CheckedInEquipment: List of equipment IDs checked in for the BOE item
inputs.ConfigurationValues: Values from the configuration matrix for cleaning and flushing
inputs.AllowOverwrite: Flag indicating if operator may overwrite retrieved values
inputs.AllowNextLike: Flag indicating if operator may specify the Next Like value

outputs.SelectedEquipmentID: Equipment ID chosen by the operator
outputs.OverwriteException: Exception type specified if values were overwritten
outputs.FlushQuantity: Required flush quantity and unit of measure
outputs.RecipeVariables: Generated variables for use in phase transition logic

preconditions: Phase configured by recipe author with Bill of Equipment and corresponding configuration matrix
Equipment has been checked in for the configured BOE item
postconditions: Electronic Batch Record updated with execution data line for cleaning
Recipe variables created for cleaning and flushing requirements
side_effects: User-generated exceptions are recorded in the Electronic Batch Record
example_usage: Operator runs the Check Cleaning phase, selects the appropriate equipment and flag values, confirms or overwrites parameters, and completes the phase to proceed with cleaning execution.
